pages.text: Farms are one of the best ways to quickly gather resources. Here is a list of some of my favorites.

pages.title: Mob Farm
pages.text: $(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l5s8kkqB7-I)Mob/XP Farm$(/l) This is a very simple, expandable, and upgradable mob/xp farm.$(br2)Hopefully, I will be able to make a video showing the different stages this farm can be extend and upgrade to.

pages.title: Iron Farm
pages.text: It is possbible to have a good iron farm up and going really fast! Here are a few links to a very easy and productive iron farms:$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6M5TBB6NPCs)Iron Farm Without a Zombie$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-oYyJ6jfSPU)Iron Farm on Day 1$(/l) Might be more challenging in skyblock.$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-dTFB8KETk)Testing Iron Farms in Minecraft$(/l)$(br2)Which One You Should Build?

pages.title: Village Breeder
pages.text: In this video, ImpulseSV show you how to build a very simple design that you can make early game that requires no redstone and will produce almost 300 iron per hour and generate 2 baby villagers each Minecraft day infinitely. $(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O6c_qSzL_us)Easy 2-in-1 Iron Farm and Infinite Villager Breeder$(/l)

pages.title: Sugarcane Farm
pages.text: Dusty Dude's $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mo6bcbPjyRA)Flying Machine Sugarcane Farm$(/l). This farm can really kick out a lot of sugarcane. I made one three chunks long and I had TONS of sugarcane! However, with the Create mod you may want to consider using it to make most of your farms.

pages.title: Cave Spider Farm
pages.text: With this very easy to make $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DFXppgfjI_A)Cave Spider Farm$(/l) you will have all of the string and spider eyes you will ever need! This is also a great early game XP farm.

pages.title: Sculk and XP Farm
pages.text: $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tsistTTK1YQ)Sculk and XP Farm$(/l) In this video $(l:https://www.youtube.com/@wattlesplays)wattles$(/l) showcases how to build an easy sculk xp or sculk block farm for Minecraft 1.19+! This farm will produce experience for you to harvest whenever you'd like as well as sculk, shriekers, and sculk sensors.
